name: Multi-Text Demo
description: Demonstration of the new multi-text message feature

messages.text: This is the first message in a sequence. ||| This is the second message that follows immediately. ||| And this is the third message, all from one JSON object!
Pretty cool, right? Now let's try with default delays:
This uses the same delay for all messages. ||| Much simpler when you don't need custom timing. ||| Perfect for rapid-fire explanations!
What do you think of this feature?
Fantastic! I'm glad you like it. ||| This feature reduces JSON verbosity significantly. ||| And it's fully backward compatible with existing sequences.
That's fair! It's most useful for consecutive bot messages that form a logical group.
No problem! The old single-message format still works perfectly. This is just an optional enhancement.
Thanks for trying the demo! Ready for more features?
